awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: A girl's mother returns after 15 years to find her daughter has married one of her (the mother's) old boyfriends. They try to mend their broken mother/daughter relationship and deal with their common lover.

title: High Heels
